message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your target, Bob! I can do $115, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
